title: HP unveils two business-ready Chromebooks, including first with smart card reader
content:
HP is expanding its lineup of business-ready Chromebooks, with the first ChromeOS devices to offer a smart card reader, including one model with the latest AMD Ryzen processors.

moreâ€¦

The post HP unveils two business-ready Chromebooks, including first with smart card reader appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: HP's latest business Chromebooks are the first to offer a smart card reader, including one model with the latest AMD Ryzen processors.
